definition.doc: Draft extension of NXbeam to include fields to describe ultra-short pulsed sources and details relevant for photoemission.

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays

sym.name: doc
sym.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays

sym.name: nx
sym.doc: Number of pixels of the chirp spectrum

field.name: pulse_energy
field.doc: Energy of a single pulse at the sample

field.name: incident_energy
field.doc: The center photon energy at sample

field.name: incident_energy_spread
field.doc: FWHM energy linewidth of the incident photons.

field.name: incident_wavelength
field.doc: The center wavelength energy at sample

field.name: incident_wavelength_spread
field.doc: FWHM wavelength linewidth of the incident photons.

field.name: incident_polarization
field.doc: Incident polarization as a Stokes vector

field.name: pulse_duration
field.doc: Duration of the pulses at the sample

group.name: chirp_spectrum
group.doc: Spectrum of pulse frequency vs time.

field.name: chirp_GDD
field.doc: Group delay dispersion of the pulse for linear chirp

field.name: flux
field.doc: flux incident on beam plane area
